TopicTitle: Refuelling ship, as opposed to refuelling tanks

Articles.Content:
So I have an ion powered minmus lander. It's got twelve radial xenon tanks (which is probably eight too many, but I like to have fuel to spare in case I want to do multiple missions). Refuelling these one at a time can be quite frustrating. Because it's right click, alt-right click, out, wait, 12 times.

Is there a means, mod or otherwise, to refuel ships en masse?

As on 0.90, you can use alt - right click to transfer from however many tanks into a single tank, or do the reverse: transfer from one tank into many. You can't transfer from many tanks to many other tanks though, unless you go through a single tank first.

0.90 added the ability to send flow to or from multiple tanks at once, by alt-right-clicking them in succession. In the screenshot above, the fuel is flowing from the Jumbo-64 into both of the FL-T400s.

I don't know if it's stapled to part-symmetry though, as that's the first time I tried it.

Ah. If only there were a large xenon tank.
There's also TAC fuel balancer mod. Very useful for multiple transfers.
Try the Goodspeed fuel pump - it lets you set which tank 'levels' so set the ones to take fuel from as '1' and the ones its to go to as '0' (fuel runs downhill), then just switch it on.
